About

Going outside

I love travelling. Some of my favourite places are Hokkaido, The Netherlands, and Switzerland. I enjoy hiking, cycling, and trying out new foods.

Uses

My daily driver is macOS on an M3 air, and I use Nix for package management. I'm a big fan of Neovim for editing but also use Zed and VS Code. I use a tiling window manager, and now I can't live without it. As for hardware, I'm pretty entrenched in the apple ecosystem. You can see the software I use here.

Programming

I like working with Rust, I'm interested in systems programming, compilers, and functional programming. I also write a lot of random CLI tools. I'm also looking to learn more about ocaml, haskell, etc. I've really been enjoying racket as a part of my CS course lately as well.

Robots & FRC

I've been involved with FIRST Robotics Competition since 2022. I've only spent 2 seasons with a team, but I've enjoyed it immensely.

Typography

I enjoy exploring different typefaces and their applications. Current favorites are Zodiak and Berkeley Mono. SF Pro is also great, as well as Anthropic Sans and Serif. Best reading font remains New York Small.

Reading & Books & Anime

I really enjoy Ted Chiang's works. I also read various blog posts a fair bit, including Construction Physics, Astral Codex Ten, Dan Lu. Aside from that, I read a lot of webnovels and other fiction. Current favourite is Lord of the Mysteries. I also watch anime, occasionally.

Arcade & Video Games

I rarely play video games now, but I play all kinds of games, mainly rhythm games, roguelites, and RPGs. Minecraft, osu!, maimai DX, Wacca, DDR, Hades, Celeste(a lot), Hollow Knight, Silksong, Divinity 2 are some of my favorites.

Other stuff I like

  • coffee and tea
  • mechanical keyboards
